thread.section_title: Hotel Standard Design - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Long weekend stay
thread.title_full: Long weekend stay - Review of Hotel Standard Design, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: davidbU334FV
title: Long weekend stay
text:
Small side street location.Plenty of bars around. Very lively at night with young, local clientele.Safe & secure. Reasonable restaurants nearby . Close to Bastille metro,nice walk to central Paris ( quite a distance )
Enjoyed the stay. (3rd ! time )
Some rooms can be a bit small and access to breakfast room is awkward if you have mobility problems
Room Tip: Try & get corner room. They are larger See more room tips
